channel.title: Comments on: Sidewinder
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis

item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/listings/sidewinder/#comment-663">Scott Wyden Kivowitz</a>.
Thanks for sharing Scott. Another fine edition to the Genesis photography scene :)

item.title: By: Scott Wyden Kivowitz
item.dc:creator: Scott Wyden Kivowitz
item.description: We just released our 13th theme and the first for 2017. It's a photography and/or photo blogging theme. It puts your blog content in the forefront.
item.content:encoded: We just released our 13th theme and the first for 2017. It’s a photography and/or photo blogging theme. It puts your blog content in the forefront.
